column1: Little Goat Diner////Now for the not so great... Because it's so packed
column2: Little Goat Diner has a large section of communal seating
column3: and it's very tempting to take these seats as it decreases your wait time. However
column4: we found that the general atmosphere of the restaurant is super loud
column5: and the mechanics of sitting at a large communal table make it rather difficult to have a coherent conversation with the people in your party sitting across from you. Additionally
column6: we found that though the food was interesting
column8: the taste really wasn't that great. 4.5/5 for the hype and vibe
